Xolisile "Xoli" Zondi (amụrụ na 17 Septemba 1983), nke a makwaara dị ka Xoli Zondi-Zamisa, bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nlereanya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro nkiri telivishọn Family Bonds, Generations na Single Galz.
A mụrụ Zondi na 17 Septemba 1983 na Hammersdale, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta diplọma na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Durban n'afọ 2003.

O nwere otu nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Mandy site na mmekọrịta mgbe ọ dị obere, ebe ọ tụụrụ ime mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii. Ọ lụrụ Phiwokuhle Zamisa, onye kansụl ime obodo, ebe emere agbamakwụkwọ ahụ na 2 Disemba 2017. Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Ukusa Zamisa onye amụrụ na 26 Ọktoba 2018.
N'afọ 2004, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri

N'afọ 2006, ọ sonyeere SABC1 sitcom Family Bonds ma rụọ ọrụ dịka "Winnie". Usoro ihe omume ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo n'afọ 2009. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ma ama nke "Zodwa Mabena" na SABC1 soap opera Generations site na 2010 ruo 2014. Maka ọrụ a, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye onye na-akwado onye isi n'ihe nkiri na 2013 Royalty Soapie Awards. N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na nke isii "Hamba Voetsek" nke oge ise nke e.tv anthology serial eKasi: Our Stories na ọrụ nke "Smangele". N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Ntsiki", na SABC1 sitcom Single Galz
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke "Nqobile Gigaba" na usoro ihe nkiri Mzansi Magic, Greed and Desire N'afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere usoro ihe nkiri e.tv, Imbewu na onye isi mgbaka "Violet".
